Introduction
This topic discusses additional matters related to forfeiture of benefits, including
entitlement to benefits based on subsequent service
resuming payments
presidential pardon petitions
processing apportionments in forfeiture cases
, and
handling disagreements with forfeiture decisions
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B  - Forfeiture of Benefits
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
